item.title: 独家报道：帕克索斯加入申请美国信托银行执照的加密货币公司行列
item.description: 贝宝稳定币背后的加密货币公司帕克索斯信托公司（Paxos Trust Company）表示，它正在申请在美国创建一家国家信托银行，加入了众多希望在传统金融体系中获得更大立足点的数字资产公司的行列。【原文：Paxos Trust Company, the cryptocurrency firm behind PayPal's stablecoin, said it is applying to create a national trust bank in the U.S., joining a raft of digital asset companies looking to gain a larger foothold in the traditional financial system.】

item.title: 福特新经济型汽车系列起价约 3 万美元
item.description: 福特公司周一表示，该公司计划于2027年开始推出新的经济型电动汽车系列，其中包括一款中型皮卡，目标起售价为3万美元，以达到中国竞争对手的成本效益。【原文：Ford plans to start rolling out its new family of affordable electric vehicles in 2027, including a midsize pickup truck with a target starting price of $30,000, the company said on Monday, as it aspires to the cost efficiency of Chinese rivals.】

item.title: 新兴国家向私人贷款机构支付的债务使其向中国支付的债务相形见绌
item.description: 研究显示，低收入国家向私人贷款机构支付的外债仍比向中国支付的外债高出三倍，这揭示了这些国家在努力偿还外债时所面临的复杂而昂贵的债权人网络。【原文：Lower-income countries' external debt payments to private lenders remain three times higher than payments to China, research shows, shedding light on the complex, costly web of creditors they face as they struggle to keep up repayments.】

item.title: Prosus 获得欧盟有条件反垄断批准，同意 Just Eat 外卖交易
item.description: 荷兰技术投资商 Prosus 同意出售其在 Delivery Hero 的股份后，于周一获得了欧盟的反垄断批准，以 41 亿欧元（47.6 亿美元）收购 Just Eat Takeaway。【原文：Dutch technology investor Prosus gained EU antitrust approval on Monday for its 4.1-billion-euro ($4.76 billion) bid for Just Eat Takeaway , after agreeing to sell down its stake in Delivery Hero .】

item.title: 黄金储备局要求美国法院就 Citgo 拍卖案举行出售听证会
item.description: 据一份文件显示，多伦多上市矿商 Gold Reserve 已要求美国联邦法院进行最终出售听证会，以决定委内瑞拉炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 母公司股份拍卖的胜出者。【原文：Toronto-listed miner Gold Reserve has asked a U.S. federal court to proceed to the final sale hearing that will decide the winner of an auction of shares in the parent of Venezuela-owned refiner Citgo Petroleum, according to a filing.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，哈特里正在洽谈收购主要可可贸易商 Touton
item.description: 两位直接了解此事的消息人士告诉路透社，全球能源和大宗商品交易商 Hartree Partners 正在洽谈收购法国农工企业 Touton。【原文：Global energy and commodities trader Hartree Partners is in talks to acquire French agro-industrial firm Touton, which trades nearly 10% of the world's cocoa, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 巴里克首席执行官表示，黄金协会正在等待美国就金条关税问题做出澄清
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining）首席执行官马克-布里斯托（Mark Bristow）周一表示，世界黄金协会（World Gold Council）正在等待美国就可能对金条征收关税一事作出澄清，但他补充说，这对矿业公司的影响微乎其微，因为它们是 "价格接受者"。【原文：Barrick Mining CEO Mark Bristow said on Monday that the World Gold Council is waiting for clarity from the United States regarding potential tariffs on gold bars, but he added that the impact on mining companies would be minimal as they are “price takers.”】

item.title: 派拉蒙以 77 亿美元获得美国 UFC 赛事版权
item.description: Skydance 旗下的派拉蒙公司周一表示，根据与 TKO 集团控股公司签订的一份从 2026 年开始为期七年的版权协议，派拉蒙将成为终极格斗冠军赛在美国的独家主场，该协议价值约 77 亿美元。【原文：Skydance-owned Paramount will become the exclusive U.S. home of Ultimate Fighting Championship under a seven-year rights deal with TKO Group Holdings , starting in 2026, that is valued at around $7.7 billion, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 美光科技因人工智能需求驱动上调季度业绩预期
item.description: 美光科技（Micron Technology）周一上调了对第四季度营收和调整后利润的预期，原因是其用于人工智能基础设施的内存芯片需求激增，这使其股价在收盘前上涨了 5%。【原文：Micron Technology on Monday raised its forecast for fourth-quarter revenue and adjusted profit, due to surging demand for its memory chips used in artificial intelligence infrastructure, sending its shares up 5% before the bell.】

item.title: 大片提高影院上座率，AMC 收入超出预期
item.description: 由于《威廉与魔兽》（A Minecraft Movie）和《莉萝与史迪奇》（Lilo & Stitch）等美国大片吸引了更多的观众前往其连锁影院，AMC Entertainment 周一公布的第二季度收入超过了华尔街的预期。【原文：AMC Entertainment surpassed Wall Street estimates for second-quarter revenue on Monday, as top U.S. blockbusters such as "A Minecraft Movie" and "Lilo & Stitch" drove more people to its theater chains.】

item.title: 印度航空公司将从 9 月起暂停德里-华盛顿航线
item.description: 印度航空公司周一表示，将从 9 月 1 日起停止印度首都与美国之间的航班服务，理由是由于计划对老旧的波音飞机进行升级而导致飞机短缺，以及巴基斯坦领空的关闭。【原文：Air India said on Monday it would stop services between the capital cities of India and the U.S. from September 1, citing aircraft shortage due to the planned upgrades to its ageing Boeing planes and the closure of Pakistan's airspace.】

item.title: 香港允许上市申请者享有更多隐私引发保密申请潮
item.description: 两位业内人士说，今年至少有二十多家中国公司秘密申请在香港上市，还有更多的公司正准备这样做，因为在市场波动加剧之际，新规定允许非公开申请。【原文：At least two dozen Chinese companies have confidentially filed for listing in Hong Kong this year and more are preparing to do so, two industry sources said, following a new rule permitting private filings at a time of heightened market volatility.】

item.title: 关税通胀忧虑、债务激增支撑美国长期国债收益率
item.description: 路透社对债券策略师的调查显示，未来几个月，美国长期国债收益率将因关税通胀忧虑和大量新债发行而小幅上升，即使短期国债收益率也会因美联储再次降息押注而下降。【原文：Longer-term U.S. Treasury yields will rise modestly in coming months on tariff inflation worries and a deluge of new debt issuance even as short-term yields fall on renewed Federal Reserve rate cut bets, a Reuters survey of bond strategists showed.】

item.title: 彼得-蒂尔支持的 Bullish 在扩大 IPO 规模时目标估值高达 48.2 亿美元
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Bullish 周一扩大了其首次公开募股的规模，目前其在美国上市的目标估值高达 48.2 亿美元，这凸显了投资者对数字资产的持续兴趣。【原文：Crypto exchange Bullish upsized its initial public offering on Monday and is now targeting a valuation of up to $4.82 billion in its U.S. listing, underscoring sustained investor interest in digital assets.】

item.title: 欧洲第二季度财报：欧元走强、关税忧虑重压，但银行业大放异彩
item.description: 欧洲企业正在证明它们几乎可以承受美国的进口关税，连续第五个季度实现盈利增长，但增长速度低于美国。【原文：European companies are proving they can just about endure U.S. import tariffs, eking out earnings growth for a fifth straight quarter, but at a slower pace than in the United States.】

item.title: 早间竞价等待 CPI、中国和阿拉斯加
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 花旗集团将标普 500 指数年底目标上调至 6,600 点
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup）周五在一份报告中表示，将年底 S&P 500 指数目标值从 6,300 点上调至 6,600 点，押注唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的税收和支出法案带来的好处将推动企业盈利走强。【原文：Citigroup raised its year-end S&P 500 index target to 6,600 from 6,300, betting on corporate earnings strength fueled by benefits from President Donald Trump's tax and spending bill, it said in a note on Friday.】

item.title: 华尔街期货持稳，芯片股受中国销售协议影响下滑
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货变化不大，投资者为繁忙的一周做准备，而在与中国的关键关税截止日期前，主要芯片公司似乎陷入了贸易政策的最新变化之中。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were little changed on Monday as investors geared up for a busy week, while major chip companies seemed caught in the middle of the latest twist in trade policy ahead of a key tariff deadline with China.】

item.title: 随着诺和诺德加大对 Wegovy 复制品的诉讼力度，投资者询问 Hims 在哪里？
item.description: 在诺和诺德公司与数十家销售其减肥药 Wegovy 廉价复制品的美国药店和公司的法律斗争中，有一个名字明显缺席：Hims & Hers。【原文：In Novo Nordisk’s legal fight against dozens of U.S. pharmacies and companies selling cheaper copies of its weight-loss drug Wegovy, one name remains conspicuously absent: Hims & Hers .】

item.title: 文件显示，印尼希望通过 "主权人工智能基金 "推动发展
item.description: 一份政府文件显示，负责监督印尼人工智能发展的当局提议设立一个 "主权人工智能基金"，为印尼成为这一快速发展技术的地区中心提供资金。【原文：Authorities overseeing the development of artificial intelligence in Indonesia have proposed a "sovereign AI fund" to finance the archipelago's ambitions to become a regional hub for the fast-growing technology, a government document showed.】

item.title: 洞察力：航空业的肮脏秘密：清洁喷气燃料故障
item.description: 2019 年，美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）首席执行官斯科特-柯比（Scott Kirby）称赞其与绿色喷气燃料生产商世界能源公司（World Energy）签订的新合同是航空业在减少排放方面学习的榜样。【原文：In 2019, Scott Kirby, the chief executive of United Airlines, hailed its new contract with green jet fuel producer World Energy as an example for the aviation industry to follow in its drive to cut emissions.】

item.title: 多伦多证券交易所（TSX）期货在美俄会晤和贸易谈判中上涨；主要数据受关注
item.description: 随着投资者将注意力转移到本周即将举行的美俄会谈、贸易谈判和关键的美国通胀数据上，周一与加拿大主要股指挂钩的期货价格也随华尔街同行而上扬。【原文：Futures tied to Canada's main stock index edged up on Monday, mirroring Wall Street peers, as investors shifted their attention to the week's upcoming U.S.-Russia talks, trade negotiations and pivotal U.S. inflation data.】

item.title: 维基百科运营商在法庭上输掉了对英国《网络安全法》规定的挑战
item.description: 维基百科运营商周一在对英国《网络安全法案》部分内容的法律质疑中败诉，该法案对网络平台提出了严格的新要求，但因可能限制言论自由而受到批评。【原文：The operator of Wikipedia on Monday lost a legal challenge to parts of Britain's Online Safety Act, which sets tough new requirements for online platforms but has been criticised for potentially curtailing free speech.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯首席执行官呼吁 "现实检查"，抨击欧盟内燃机禁令
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）首席执行官周一在接受媒体采访时批评了欧盟从2035年起禁止二氧化碳排放车辆的计划，并加入了今年即将对该目标进行审查的质疑声浪。【原文：The CEO of Mercedes-Benz criticised the European Union's plan to ban CO2-emitting vehicles from 2035 in a media interview on Monday, joining a chorus of voices calling the target into question as it comes up for review this year.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，乌克兰 Kyivstar 公司将在具有里程碑意义的美国上市中融资最多 2 亿美元
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，乌克兰最大的电信运营商 Kyivstar 预计通过今年在纽约具有里程碑意义的股市上市融资 5000 万至 2 亿美元。【原文：Ukraine's biggest telecoms operator Kyivstar expects to raise between $50 million and $200 million through a landmark stock market listing in New York this year, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 印度估计约 55% 的输美商品将面临特朗普关税
item.description: 印度政府周一表示，印度出口到美国的商品中约有 55% 将受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府征收关税的影响。【原文：About 55% of India's merchandise exports to the United States will be subject to the tariff imposed by President Donald Trump's administration, the Indian government said on Monday.】

item.title: 内阁官员称台湾将继续与美国进行关税谈判
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收 20% 的关税后，台湾内阁仍在谈判更优惠的关税税率，副总理郑丽群周一表示。【原文：Taiwan's cabinet is still negotiating for more favourable tariff rates after a 20% levy was imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump, Vice Premier Cheng Li-chiun said on Monday.】

item.title: 在印度，特朗普关税引发抵制美国商品的呼声
item.description: 从麦当劳（McDonald's）和可口可乐（Coca-Cola）到亚马逊（Amazon）和苹果（Apple），总部设在美国的跨国公司在印度正面临抵制的呼声，因为企业高管和印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的支持者煽动反美情绪，抗议美国加征关税。【原文：From McDonald's and Coca-Cola to Amazon and Apple, U.S.-based multinationals are facing calls for a boycott in India as business executives and Prime Minister Narendra Modi's supporters stoke anti-American sentiment to protest against U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 美国银行调查发现，"漫长的华丽七日 "再次成为全球最拥挤的行业
item.description: 根据美国银行（BofA）的月度基金经理调查，随着乐观的盈利和全球经济情绪的改善，投资者重回股市，持有美国大型科技股再次成为最受欢迎的交易。【原文：Owning big U.S. tech stocks is once again the most popular trade, according to BofA's monthly fund manager survey, as upbeat earnings and improved sentiment towards the global economy send investors back into stocks.】

item.title: 日本不断加深的政治困境为预算和加息时间蒙上阴影
item.description: 分析师说，日本政治不确定性的加深有可能延长政策瘫痪的时间，这可能会影响明年预算的起草和央行下次加息的时机，给脆弱的经济前景蒙上阴影。【原文：Japan's deepening political uncertainty risks prolonging policy paralysis that could affect the drafting of next year's budget and the timing of the central bank's next interest rate hike, analysts say, clouding the outlook for the fragile economy.】
